title: Motley Fool Money: 10.26.2012
description: Apple misses on 4th quarter earnings.  Facebook reports better-than-expected earnings.  And Amazon reports its first quarterly loss since 2003.  Plus, former Circuit City CEO Alan Wurtzel talks about Circuit City's past and Best Buy's future.
content:encoded: Apple misses on 4th quarter earnings.  Facebook reports better-than-expected earnings.  And Amazon reports its first quarterly loss since 2003.  Plus, former Circuit City CEO Alan Wurtzel talks about Circuit City's past and Best Buy's future.
